definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
from beginning to end/in its entirety/in accord with fact/literal

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授講的話原原本本紀錄下來然後記住。

sentences.english: It would have been Hefner's third marriage.
sentences.chinese: 這原本將是赫夫納的第三次婚姻。

sentences.english: Aeriform lieutenant general does group of relations intimately to be done aloof and tensely originally.
sentences.chinese: 無形中將原本親密的幹羣關係弄得疏遠而緊張了。

sentences.english: They are three times removed from the ideal forms of objects in reality.
sentences.chinese: 使現實的東西完全喪失了原本的完美造型。

sentences.english: The site of the Forbidden City was situated on the Imperial City during the Mongol Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 紫禁城原本位於蒙元時期的都城。

sentences.english: FY : Well, if there were, You would not tell me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜歡他，你也不會原原本本地告訴我了。

sentences.english: It was originally designed for the pilot Clone Wars micro-series.
sentences.chinese: 它原本是爲《克隆人戰爭》微系列劇的飛行員設計的。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, Huang Jizhong translates religion and Western culture contents almost word for word out.
sentences.chinese: 黃繼忠將有關西方文化內容原原本本地翻譯了出來。

sentences.english: As the final lysis of his disease, his skin returned to its original color.
sentences.chinese: 當他的疾病終於漸退，他的皮膚恢復爲原本的顏色。

sentences.english: Originally wanted to dissolve the heart of small read slowly, and, behold, the little read away from home.
sentences.chinese: 原本想化解小念心裏的心結，不料，小念離家出走。

sentences.english: My heart ached for that part of me that was slipping away.
sentences.chinese: 原本屬於我生活的一部分正在遠去，這讓我心痛不已。

sentences.english: Wandering re-establishes the original harmony which once existed between man and the universe.
sentences.chinese: 旅行重新建立起了原本存在於人類與宇宙之間的和諧。

sentences.english: Luke’s journey to becoming a Jedi Knight would have had a lot more bumps.
sentences.chinese: 盧克成爲絕地武士的旅程原本要更加坎坷。

sentences.english: Dancing or ballroom dancing in particular, used to be very popular among universities.
sentences.chinese: 跳舞，跳交誼舞，原本在大學中是很流行的。

sentences.english: Many of our medicines originate in plants.
sentences.chinese: 許多藥物原本都是來自於植物。

sentences.english: Jiggle may make running both more difficult and injurious than it needs to be.
sentences.chinese: 最後，可能使跑步變得比原本更加具困難性和傷害性。

definition: original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
original/former/originally/formerly/at first/so, actually, as it turns out
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
